description:
Job Type: Full-time, Permanent

Location: Los Angeles

Salary: $120K-$150K

An innovative company involved in a variety of business sectors is searching for a detail-oriented and resourceful executive assistant to support their CEO. This is an opportunity to be a part of a company that is saving lives and making the world a better place. If you’re interested in opportunities for growth and working on revolutionary projects, this is the role for you.

Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience in an executive assistant, project management, or investor/donor relations role
  • Exceptional organizational and time management skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to manage projects
  • Resourceful
  • Highly detail-oriented
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities

Duties

  • Screen, route, and respond to all email/phone correspondence as needed
  • Maintain calendar, schedule meetings, and act as a gatekeeper
  • Make travel arrangements for the CEO
  • Act as the liaison between the CEO and various internal and external partners
  • Prepare reports and analysis of special projects
  • Manage company projects

Benefits

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Vision insurance
